method.name: SetIdleAction

arg.name: device
arg.description: The device could be computer or backlight. Refer to PowerDeviceType definition in power_i.h

arg.name: supply
arg.description: Refer to PowerSupplyMode definition in power_i.h.

arg.name: idle_timeout
arg.description: The idle timeout in seconds. If the value is less than or equal to 0, then the idle action will be cancel and the action field is ignored.

arg.name: action
arg.description: Refer to PowerAction definition in power_i.h, etc.

method.description: If the idle time of the device exceed idle_timeout, then it will trigger the action.

method.name: GetIdleAction

arg.name: idle_action
arg.description: The field contains idle timeout and action.

method.description: Get the idle action for the specified device on the supply.

method.name: SetEventAction

arg.name: event
arg.description: Refer to PowerEvent definition in power_i.h.

method.description: The action is triggered when the event is happened.

method.name: GetEventAction
method.description: The action when the event is happened.

method.name: SetBrightness

arg.name: device
arg.description: The device could be monitor or keyboard. Refer to PowerDeviceType definition in power_i.h

method.description: Set the brightness percentage for the specified device.

method.name: GetBrightness
method.description: Get the brightness percentage for the specified device. Return -1 if the device doesn't support brightness setting.

property.name: on_battery
property.description: Indicates whether the system is running on battery power.

property.name: lid_is_present
property.description: If the system has a lid device.
